page.title: 09ROADS AND TRANSPORT CONTD.
page.content: LAMBLEY.Lined,mettled,6 m wide. Pavements,kerbs,gutters,bus service. 6 cars=6.120p/hr.ST4_LINGWOOD LANE.Lined ,mettled,no catseyes,no pavements,kerb s,gutters.No bus service.1 tractor=1. 20 p/hr.ST5_NOTTINGHAM RD. Lined,kerbs ,gutters,pavements,no catseyes. 10 m wide. 7 cars,1 van,1 motorcycle=9.180 p/hr.ST6_BANK HILL.Lined,mettled,10 m wide No kerbs,gutters,pavements catsey es,16 cars=16.320p/hr. A good organised BUS SERVICE which run s approx every hour except Saturday which is every 2 hours.MAPPLERY PLAINS very good road CATFOOT LANE Bendy,narr ow only a country lane.MAIN ROAD Typical village rd,wide for what it is LINGWOOD LANE Isolated spot not a busy link.NOTT'M RD A fairly main link with Nott'm.BANK HILL Quite hilly road :works with Nottingham road.
